title: Joining TD Bank as Financial Analyst
preview: I have accepted an internship position at TD Bank as a Financial Analyst, where I will be working on financial analysis and reporting.
fullText:
I have accepted an internship position at TD Bank as a Financial Analyst, where I will be working on financial analysis and reporting.

As a Financial Analyst, I will be involved in extracting, validating, and reconciling system-generated data for journal entries across multiple business units. I will also be producing P&L, Cash Flow, and MD&A reports used to inform quarterly performance reviews and capital planning.
